titleStmt.title: His Majesties regulation in the business of plate-carriage, &c. with his establishment of an allowance for their tables, and other encouragements to his sea-commanders ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
Pepys, Samuel, 1633-1703.

notesStmt.note: Signed: "By His Majesties Command -- S. Pepys : A true copy" -- p. 7.

Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
